name: education-platform-migration
description: MongoDB to PostgreSQL/Supabase migration tool for education platform

scripts.setup:supabase: psql -f 01_schema.sql && psql -f 02_enrollments_payments.sql && psql -f 03_live_sessions_assignments.sql && psql -f 04_indexes_constraints.sql && psql -f 05_security_rls.sql && psql -f 06_initial_data.sql
